name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Tooling Engineer, I possess extensive expertise in **Solidworks** and **Mold Flow**, with over 9 years of experience in designing and developing effective tooling solutions that align with DFM (Design for Manufacture) principles. I am skilled in **injection mold tooling**, **LSR tooling**, and implementing **scientific molding practices** to enhance product quality and reduce development time. My strengths include strong analytical problem-solving abilities, exceptional customer communication, and a commitment to continuous improvement and process development. A self-starter with excellent organizational skills, I excel in leading teams to drive innovative solutions and foster a culture of flexibility and teamwork.
